name: Riki Iwasaki
title: Moenjenere wa Serweboleta
summary: Motlhabolodi wa Software yo o nang le Maitemogelo, yo o batlang tshono e ntšhwa ya go direla diporojeke tse dikgolo. O na le kgatlhego ya go tlhama kgotsa go tsenya khoutu gore ba bangwe ba e dirise. Ke dumela gore bokgoni jwa me bo bonnye fa bo bapisiwa le inthanete, ka jalo ke na le kgatlhego e kgolo ya go dira le didirisiwa tse dingwe, ditirelo, dipuo tsa go dira diporokeramo.

education.school: Yunibesithi ya Puso ya California ya Fullerton

experience.title: Moenjenere wa Serweboleta
responsibilities: Go tlhamilwe le go tsenngwa tirisong ditiriso tsa webo tse di kgonang go lekanyediwa go dirisiwa React le Node.js
Tirisanommogo le batsamaisi ba dikumo go tokafatsa ditlhokego le go netefatsa gore di gorosiwa ka nako
Go tlhamilwe le go tlhokomelwa di-API tsa RESTful tsa ditiriso tsa webo
Go tlhamilwe dikwalwa tsa go dira ditiro ka go itirisa le go tokafatsa bokgoni jwa tsone

experience.title: Mothusa-Mokatisi wa Thenese
responsibilities: Go ruta dithekeniki tsa thenese mo setlhopheng sa batshameki ba le 5-10
Go dira gore thuto e nne monate le go itumedisa batshameki
O na le maikarabelo a pabalesego ya batshameki mo lebaleng, bogolo jang batshameki ba ba botlana le ba bagolo, jaaka ba dingwaga di le 3 le ba dingwaga di le 60

experience.title: Modirisani yo o tswang
responsibilities: Go tlhopha diotara tsa dikhasetomara tsa mo inthaneteng
Go pega diotara mo dilloring tsa thomelo
Go thusa dikhasetomara go bona dilwana mo lebentleleng
Go boloka bobolokelo bo le phepa e bile bo rulagantswe sentle
Go boloka tikologo e e babalesegileng le e e botsalano ya bareki le badiri

projects.name: Photefolio
projects.description: Webosaete e e tsibogang e e bontshang diporojeke le bokgoni ka go dirisa dithekenoloji tsa segompieno tsa webo
